citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1200pm on
09-NOV-16.
Inspectors came in contact with a facility representative. The facility representative informed inspectors that no one
was available for in inspection at that time.
Additional Inspectors
Neafsey Michael, Assistant Director
